comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: According to www.arlingtoncemetery.net/ceclark.htm this would be Charles Edgar Clark [no "e"] Rear Admiral, United States Navy

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: An American hero in the Spanish-American War. Also at: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Edgar_Clark

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: swang and artolog:  Thanks for finding the full and correct name for Clark.  We'll fix the description next time we update.
